meanings.definition: the act of writing about one's own life
meanings.sent1: Her autographies revealed her deepest thoughts and experiences.
meanings.sent2: The library had a section dedicated to famous autographies.
meanings.sent3: His autographies were so detailed, they read like a thrilling novel.
meanings.sent4: In her autographies, she painted a vivid picture of her childhood memories.
meanings.sent5: The power of autographies lies in capturing personal stories for future generations.

meanings.definition: a collection of writings by a single author
meanings.sent1: The autographies of the renowned author were highly sought after.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed an impressive collection of autographies from different eras.
meanings.sent3: The autographies on the shelf seemed to whisper stories of the past.
meanings.sent4: His autographies stood out like a colorful mosaic in the literary world.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the autographies in the archive was like diving into history itself.

meanings.definition: relating to the study of one's own handwriting
meanings.sent1: The autographies analysis helped uncover the writer's personality traits.
meanings.sent2: She attended a workshop on autographies to improve her handwriting.
meanings.sent3: His autographies skills were so refined, they were mistaken for calligraphy.
meanings.sent4: The autographies expert could identify individuals based on their handwriting.
meanings.sent5: The art of autographies study revealed hidden insights into self-expression.
